post:
HostMada has been founded in 2013 and started as a group of IT professionals to introduce a new standard in the fast changing environment of web hosting.
Don't be fooled by our low prices; what you see is what you receive.
We are in this market to provide quality at the best value prices, NOT to rip off our customers.


**Availability:**

**Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania | Atlanta, Georgia | Dallas, Texas | Rotterdam, Netherlands**

**XMAS SPECIAL**

Use promo code "**40XMAS**" to get 40% off 1st month on our OpenVZ VPS plans (Wilkes-Barre, Atlanta, Dallas)!

Use promo code "**EULAUNCH**" to receive 35% off your first three months on Rotterdam location!


**OVZ-1**

    50GB Disk Space
    1000GB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit Port Speed
    512MB Guaranteed DDR3 RAM
    512MB vSwap RAM
    1 CPU Core
    1 IPv4 Address
    **20 Gbps FREE DDoS Protection (Dallas only)**
    **80 Gbps FREE DDoS Protection (Rotterdam only)**


Quarterly: $6.00 /quarter
